name: Star Fighter (itch) (Claudio Visentin)
description:
Star Fighter is the retro shooter you didn't know you needed! Boost, fight and barrel roll your way into the past future!

Jake please finish adding the story.

An experimental game made during my second year in college (2018), Star Fighter focuses on a meta narrative where the lead programmer has been left without an artist to finish the game. Join the developer in order to play what's left of the game!

The game has been updated and polished for modern hardware and features improved writing from the original version.

Keyboard Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Spacebar - Shoot
  • Arrow Keys - Special Moves
  • E - Lean Right
  • Q - Lean Left
  • Z - Boost
  • X - Slow Down

Xbox Controller Controls:

  • Left Joystick - Move
  • A - Shoot
  • D-Pad - Special Moves
  • Right Trigger - Boost
  • Left Trigger - Slow Down
  • Right Bumper - Lean Right
  • Left Bumper - Lean Left
